summary: A man embarks on a bloody rampage to save his kidnapped brother.

reviews.content: Most illogical movie ever. Whether its the action scenes or the humor. It goes over the head. The performances don't seem to work as well. There's absolutely no reason to watch it.
Great action but lacks stregth in story

It is movies like "Baaghi 3" that make Bollywood look bad and keep the industry from reaching its full potential. Almost every single moment of this movie is complete nonsense. This is the worst movie in the series but also one of the worst movies I have seen recently. Even if you like mindless action movies this movie is so completely devoid of logic and driven by a story that is so ridiculously stupid, it is almost laughable. In fact, if you watch this movie as one of those movies that are so bad it's entertaining, there is potentially some value in it. Even among the terrible Indian movies, I have seen before, this one reaches a true low. We as a society need to stop giving our money to movies like this because the fact that anyone thought this was a good idea is mind-boggling.
Man this was a horrible  movie,  the last hour of was just brainless.  The misuse of CGI in this movie was a waste of money and made no sense
Where is Bollywood going
Action pack, no story line or drama

Let's just say that, if Tiger Shroff was a Hollywood actor. Then Baaghi 3 would end his career single handedly
But then he works in bollywood were nothing really counts.
So here we are at the crossroads where nothing matters... really
Why waste your valuable time on this junk of a movie.
Stay away, read a newspaper instead 😁🤦🏾‍♀️
If only I could give it stars in minus because it sent Bollywood about a decade backward.
Epic entertainmenter, mass class action, story linr
The concept and the storyline is so shitty that even a baby boy will watch Dragonball Z  cartoon rather than torturing himself with this bullshit :) . Oh god Save bollywood from nepotism

As a die-hard Tiger Shroff fan, I was greatly disappointed. Tiger gives his 100% as always but the story, plot, dialogues absent. The movie is suppose to be an action thriller but somehow, it turns into an unintentional comedy. I went opening weekend & found myself along with the rest of the audience laughing outloud. Laughing so hard that I was crying! So if you're in the mood for a great comedy, go check out this 3rd installment of Baaghi.

Oh god, what a drama between the brothers. The climax is very bad. Didn't watch a  bad Hindi movie in the recent times. Looking at the trailer I expected a good suspense movie like TAKEN (English Movie).
The most stupid and insane movie that was ever made 1 man killing a whole army with bare hands its like a comic book story
I loved Tiger Shroff Actions
This is an enormous piece of shit from bollywood
The worst movie I have ever seen in my life . In reality the worstest movie ever made.
It  has the effect as Matrix movie .

Another foreign movie with ENGLISH subtitles! 
Could not understand a thing!!!
one of the flop movie in 2020 I was very dessipontied yesterday when I saw  in this movie

Wow,  this movie was just bad. Tiger Shroff gave us the action, but nobody bothered to bring a coherent script. There were characters that showed up for no reason, made no sense when they were there & disappeared with no explaination. The dialogue was so absurd that the movie would have been better off with no dialogue whatsoever and just the inexplicable action sequences.  When Siya claims that Vikram's being sent to Syria is "amazing, it'll be like a paid holiday", then you know that no one writing the script cared how bad this movie would be. I know it's too much to ask that all action movies be as good as the epic Baahubali movies, but do they really need to be this absurd???
WOW!  Tiger gave it his all -  we really enjoyed the story and action. Very surprised about the ratings as it was as true action drama in every since of the word.
No story... they think audience is foolish... helicopters dropping from sky for no reason... at least an attempt should have been made to show why was something happening... ridiculous...

Worst movie . Ahmed Khan should stick to choreography ( not sure he is good at it) but at least  stop directing . Senseless action sequence , why do you need 5 tanks to kill a guy running without any weapons. Poorly made movie , Tiger Shroff got wasted in this movie.
It's been a while since I saw a movie as bad as this!
It was just ridiculous.

I agree with Devesh Sharma a better story is needed... but if you want to see some action most of the movie seems to be an action scene because I can't remember any other scenes and I just watched it :0 ...
'Baaghi 3' is a disappointing action thriller which seems to be produced to only showcase Tiger Shroff's unreal flexibility.
It had good action scenes but you have to leave your brain outside because the action scenes were not believable .
The movie has some improvised and super- intentional stunt sequences but, terribly lacks the works of the hero to be blended on the audience's heart. It was better to make Tiger dead!
What a movie,not better then war but really too enthusiastic!!!!
Dont watch this movie
One word to describe this movie...”Trash”...You might wanna save your money and time.

Same stupid story that many Indian movies have been made on. Nothing attractive or sensible. Indian film industry has been a big time copycat of Hollywood, but still there's no match. Calling themselves Bollywood is one of the biggest examples.

Really unrealistic 
Senseless script with copied action sequences 
Really poor dialogues of lead actors 
Wasted alot of talented supporting actors by giving them poor dialogues and delivery
Overall review 
Rotten movie 
25% on rotten tomatoes I can say
